mapper.select: select u.username,u.password,r.roleid as roleid,concat(u.username,u.password_salt) as salt from users u join user_role r on u.id=r.userid where u.username=#{username}
SELECT r.role FROM roles r where r.id=(select z.roleId FROM users u join user_role z on u.id=z.userId where u.username=#{username})
select p.permission from permissions p join role_permisssion x on p.id=x.permissionId where x.roleId=(select z.roleId FROM users u join user_role z on u.id=z.userId where u.username=#{username})
